'''Twilight Arbiter''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 3.5]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2023-03-01 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2023-03-21 17:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Judicator of Secrets" [[Cyno]] ({{Electro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Trial by Fire" [[Bennett]] ({{Pyro}}), "Shining Idol" [[Barbara]] ({{Hydro}}), and "Sprout of Rebirth" [[Collei]] ({{Dendro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
